original_title: Psalty's Songs for Li'l Praisers, Volume 1: God Loves Me So-o Much!
overview: Songs for Li'l Praisers  God Loves Me So-o Much!  Psalty and the Kids are in the Worship Workshop meeting Psalty's new invention, The Nose-It-All!  Songs List:  I'm a Li'l Praiser  This Little Light of Mine  Give Me Oil in My Lamp  God Is So Good  Say To The Lord I Love You  Doodle Oodle  Jesus Loves Me
title: Psalty's Songs for Li'l Praisers, Volume 1: God Loves Me So-o Much!
